physical_appearance:This is a beige embroidered robe. It has long sleeves and is flared towards the bottom. The collar buttons on the top-left corner
 creating two oval openings. The fabric is made of a repeated geometric pattern.
subject_terms_1:folk costume chikankari

subject_terms_3:Indian costumes
subject_terms_4:
sgcool_label_text:Robe or angarkha
 a long tunic style top for men
 with chikankari embroidery that is particularly associated with the Lucknow region. Most likely would have been used by the upper classes.

metadata.physical_appearance: This is a beige embroidered robe. It has long sleeves and is flared towards the bottom. The collar buttons on the top-left corner, creating two oval openings. The fabric is made of a repeated geometric pattern.
metadata.sgcool_label_text: Robe or angarkha, a long tunic style top for men, with chikankari embroidery that is particularly associated with the Lucknow region. Most likely would have been used by the upper classes.
